summary: Adds two battle axes from The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
Hello, this is my third mod. This mod adds two battle axes named [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Stormkiss]Stormkiss[/url] and [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Cloudcleaver]Cloudcleaver[/url] from The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind.

[color=#f6b26b]How to get:[/color]
To get these weapons you need Arcane Blacksmith, each weapon cost 3 [color=#ffd966]iron ingots[/color] and 1 [color=#ffd966]glow dust[/color]. You can also upgrade them using [color=#ffd966]glow dust[/color].

[img]http://i.imgur.com/6AoM8ih.png[/img]
 [img]http://i.imgur.com/Jb2CeT4.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iLrFEhr.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/Lh4zFpE.png[/img]
author: bigredd
